attributes.action: Build a better skate park in Liverpool
attributes.additional_details:
In Liverpool there is a really cheap skate park, I would like there to be a brand new one built just for skaters only, no bikers or scooters.

Many other areas/towns/cities have skate parks and have seen a reduction in anti-social behavior and reduced crime from teenagers. This is because they have somewhere to meet and enjoy themselves.

rejection.details: Really one for the Local Authority, not the UK Government
